title: Black Bird
description:
A bird with black feathers, shown either standing in full profile or as a bird head. Can be used to represent various black-feathered birds, such as crows, ravens, blackbirds, and more.

Black-feathered birds have been associated with magic and the occult across many global cultures, often as an omen of bad tidings.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the black bird emoji is rendered with a sleek, obsidian finish, capturing the elegance of a raven or crow in flight. Its wings are softly curved with subtle gradients that suggest feathers, and a touch of Apple's signature glossy shading gives it a polished, almost jewel-like appearance. This emoji on Apple devices often symbolizes freedom, mystery, or a message delivered swiftly.
